alert.note: Alert for Doniphan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 08 at 12:25AM CDT until June 08 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN DONIPHAN AND ATCHISON COUNTIES... At 1225 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Willis to near Effingham to Perry Lake, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Atchison, Effingham, Lancaster, Muscotah, Denton, Severance, Farmington, Huron, Leona, Arrington, Bendena, Cummings and Fanning. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
